programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Non-binary performance artist Susan Williams adores theatre. Their latest show, Illegally Blind, is based on their experience living with Visual Snow Syndrome - a rare form of blindness.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
(S18EP13) Over 6 feet tall at just 13 years old, Milly manages the rare condition Marfan Syndrome, while grieving the loss of her mum to bowel cancer.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc:
Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Sitting Tall: The Patrick Anderson Story
programme.desc:
Sitting Tall: The Patrick Anderson Story examines the background and career of Patrick Anderson, arguably the greatest wheelchair basketball player of all time as he prepares for the 2020 Paralympic Games in Tokyo.
Année : 2011

programme.title: The Invincible James Lee
programme.desc:
James Lee is a husband, father, avid athlete, and is about to become a double amputee. Follow James on his journey, from early doctor's appointments to the surgery room and eventual recovery.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Ça me regarde
programme.desc:
(S09EP33) On accueille Martin Deschamps, pour nous parler de sa nouvelle émission, en compagnie de la productrice Isabelle Maréchal.. On parle d'un nouveau traitement potentiel contre la DMLA.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Level Playing Field
programme.desc:
We get the ball rolling with Amy Burk, Canada's most prolific scorer in Women's Goalball. Then, we hit the ground running with Alex Bobbie Mason, an athlete using sport to better lives in his community.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Mind Set Go
programme.desc:
Darryl began his retreat from the world after learning a degenerative hearing condition will leave him deaf. Now, after spending too much time on social media and snacking, he's overweight and self-conscious.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Level Playing Field
programme.desc:
We get the ball rolling with Amy Burk, Canada's most prolific scorer in Women's Goalball. Then, we hit the ground running with Alex Bobbie Mason, an athlete using sport to better lives in his community.
Année : 2011

programme.title: #IGotThis
programme.desc:
(S04EP07) In this episode: Representation matters. Injured as a teenager, a young woman doesn't realize her own potential until she meets other wheelchair users in university.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Double Tap TV
programme.desc:
(S05EP34) On this episode of Double Tap TV, we're joined by Celine Lee from Amazon to discuss the company's groundbreaking collaboration with Cochlear to enhance the TV viewing experience for people with hearing implants.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Disrupt
programme.desc:
(S01EP01) This episode of Disrupt spotlights the talent and creativity of a musician, a poet, a comedian, a filmmaker and a choir of performers who are Deaf.
Année : 2023

programme.title: Best of Now With Dave Brown
programme.desc:
(S04EP16) Join Dave Brown as he discusses the latest news, entertainment, sports and current events through a disability lens.
Année : 2023

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
(S06EP04) We visit the Kamloops Waterski club and their adaptive clinic, where everyone has the opportunity to tip their toes in the water and try water skiing. Get on the water and take the disability out of the sport.
Année : 2023

programme.title: Dish With Mary
programme.desc:

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:

Année : 2023

programme.title: You Can't Ask That
programme.desc:
(S02EP04) People living with Schizophrenia talk about what it's like and how they stay well in a society that is often quick to judge.
Année : 2023

programme.title: Postcards From ...
programme.desc:
Join AMI presenters Laura Bain and Shelby Travers as they travel to Canada's most easterly province, Newfoundland and Labrador, and experience the dramatic coastlines, colourful culture and friendly people in this unique part of the country.
Année : 2023

programme.title: Le fardeau de la preuve
programme.desc:
